description:
🐍🐍 Pycon Colombia 2023 in this edition brings guests from another dimension, This year, we will have the participation of Catherine Devlin.
A freak accident in 1999 transformed Catherine Devlin from a chemical engineering graduate student into a database administrator.  She got her start with Python at PyCon US 2004, and has been a Python community addict ever since, serving as PyOhio's founding chair in 2008.  She works as a data architect for Corning.  She lives in the woods near Dayton, OH, USA, with her wife, two cats, and two horses; she usually has sticks in her hair.

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/catherinedevlin
Github: https://github.com/catherinedevlin
Twitter: https://twitter.com/catherinedevlin?lang=es

This is the beginning of great announcements, follow us on our social networks so you don't miss any updates.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pyconcolombia
Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconcolombia
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pyconcolombia/
Telegram: https://t.me/pyconcolombia
LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/company/pycon-colombia/
Tik Tok: https://www.tiktok.com/@pyconcolombia
title: Catherine Devlin PyCon Colombia 2023
